alert.note: Alert for Adams; Brown; Clinton; Fayette; Highland; Pike; Ross (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 5:56PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF EAST CENTRAL BROWN, NORTHERN ADAMS, SOUTHEASTERN FAYETTE, EAST CENTRAL CLINTON, NORTHWESTERN PIKE, HIGHLAND AND SOUTHWESTERN ROSS COUNTIES THROUGH 630 PM EDT... At 555 PM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near New Vienna to near Winchester, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Hillsboro, Greenfield, Leesburg, New Vienna, Winchester, Marshall, Belfast, Rocky Fork Point, Highland Holiday, Cynthiana, New Market, Emerald, Highland, South Salem, Sinking Spring, East Monroe, Samantha, May Hill, Locust Grove and Lees Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Brown; Clinton; Fayette; Highland; Pike; Ross
